title: Taking Medicine to the Streets
description:
When medical student Safa Abdulkadir showed up at a protest in her hometown of Minneapolis wearing her white lab coat, she had no intention of practicing medicine... until someone who needed help asked if she was a doctor.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
